meanings.definition: Not providing moral or intellectual instruction or enlightenment.
meanings.sent1: The unedifying movie did not teach us any important lessons.
meanings.sent2: The unedifying book failed to educate the readers on any meaningful topics.
meanings.sent3: The unedifying lecture left the students feeling bored and uninterested.
meanings.sent4: The unedifying behavior of the characters made the story lack depth and meaning.
meanings.sent5: The unedifying documentary failed to inspire any thoughtful discussions.

meanings.definition: Not improving or benefiting in a moral or intellectual sense.
meanings.sent1: The unedifying conversation did not lead to any positive outcomes.
meanings.sent2: The unedifying experience left me feeling uninspired and unmotivated.
meanings.sent3: The unedifying advice given by the counselor was not helpful at all.
meanings.sent4: The unedifying news about the company's financial troubles was disheartening.
meanings.sent5: The unedifying decision to cut funding for education had negative consequences.
